item.description:
I know it's Father's Day, but for those who won't be with Dad to celebrate, join me for a short hike at the McCann Family Farm in Somers, a Northern Connecticut Land Trust Property.

Directions: Route 190 east of the village. Parking lot is on the south side of 190, about 0.7 miles east of Route 83

Description: This hilly 84 acres is farmland and mixed forest. Located on it are two brooks and two vernal pools. It was acquired by gift in 1997 from the McCanns. It is being used for farming, timber, and a nature preserve. It includes extensive hiking trails and the Whit Davis Bird Sanctuary.

If anyone is interested, we can grab a bite to eat afterwards.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet you in the pakring lot
